description: '''Esoteric''' is an English [[funeral doom metal]] band from [[Birmingham]], founded in 1992. Releasing seven studio albums, and a demo, the band is widely regarded as among the first groups to develop the funeral doom style. The band has named a variety of groups as influences, such as metal bands [[Morbid Angel]] and [[My Dying Bride]], more "trippy" artists such as [[Pink Floyd]], [[Spacemen 3]], and [[King Crimson]], and the [[industrial music|industrial]] and [[dark ambient]] genres.
